title: Fighting Back Against the Great Reset | Guests: Jeff Rosenblum & Jeffrey Tucker | 1/18/22
description:
Glenn shares some good news regarding companies and states fighting back against BlackRock, the Great Reset, and the takeover of our banks. Founder and president of the Brownstone Institute Jeffrey Tucker joins Glenn to discuss the infamous lab leak, Dr. Fauci, and how we missed it. American Greatness senior contributor Julie Kelly joins to discuss how Democrats are using the Capitol riot to target political enemies, not actual threats. Author and co-founder of Questus Jeff Rosenblum joins Glenn to discuss his new book, “Exponential: Transform Your Brand by Empowering Instead of Interrupting,” and how businesses and consumers are navigating the current political storm.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
